Articles.Content:
So my RSS/RO/RP-0 career started getting frequent CTDS, I hadn't gotten far, so I decided to reinstall everything, leave out a few mods that I didn't think I needed. But one in particular did something I liked....it kept all the non-RP-0 parts in a separate folder and hid any part you hadn't purchased yet in R&D. This mod was awesome cuz it kept the clutter in the VAB away, but somehow that mod didn't end up in my new install, and I can't figure out which one did it. Anyone know?

 

EDIT: Figured out it was Filter Extensions i was missing. Moderator, you can lock or delete this thread

Edited May 30, 2016 by EliasDanger
